mapper.insert: insert into submit(uploaderName, submitHomeworkId, submitFileName, submitLocation, fileSuffix) values (#{uploaderName},#{submitHomeworkId}, #{submitFileName}, #{submitLocation}, #{fileSuffix})
mapper.select: select count(1) from submit sub where sub.submitHomeworkId = #{submitHomeworkId} and sub.uploaderName = #{uploaderName}
mapper.delete: delete from submit where uploaderName = #{uploaderName} and submitHomeworkId = #{submitHomeworkId}
